item.title: Observability
item.description: TBC Observability … life is good is the systems [applications & infrastructure] you support are reporting information to a central repository that gives you a 360 update to date view. Life is not so sweet if you’re missing any of the 3 [logging, metrics & tracing] pillars of observability. I can think of 2 system configurations where these pillars had been different to add; docker & serverless. Luckily, with the sidecar pattern for containers and closer integrations with Serverless services, make this less of on issue.
